trait.silentcompat.diurnal.desc: Deal increased damage during the day. Gear slowly repairs during the day
trait.silentcompat.dodging.desc: Grants a chance to avoid damage.
trait.silentcompat.edible.desc: Chance to drop a chocolate chip on durability loss
trait.silentcompat.ender_flu.desc: Infects the target with Ender Flu
trait.silentcompat.featherweight.desc: Targets take additional knockback when hit
trait.silentcompat.fleetfooted.desc: Increases speed while jumping and sprinting on-hit
trait.silentcompat.freezing.desc: Attacks build up freezing on target. At max freeze, damage is dealth over time
trait.silentcompat.hungering_strike.desc: Deal more damage while under half hunger
trait.silentcompat.nocturnal.desc: Deal increased damage at night. Gear slowly repairs at night
trait.silentcompat.soul_steal.desc: Chance to gain life steal on hit
trait.silentcompat.vorpal.desc: Deal more damage to targets with over 100 hearts
